mapper.select: SELECT * FROM question_board ORDER BY NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_board (writer, title, content, category) VALUES(#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category})
INSERT INTO answers (writer, content, ref, ref_category_no) VALUES(#{writer}, #{content}, #{ref}, 1)

INSERT INTO upload_file (extension, original_fileName, new_fileName, file_size, board_no, ref_category_no) VALUES
(#{item.extension}, #{item.original_fileName}, #{item.new_fileName},#{item.file_size},#{no},#{ref_category_no})
mapper.select: SELECT q.*, COUNT(DISTINCT u.uf_no) AS ufNoCount, COUNT(DISTINCT a.answer_no) AS answerCount FROM question_board q LEFT JOIN upload_file u ON q.no = u.board_no AND u.ref_category_no = 1 LEFT JOIN answers a ON q.no = a.ref AND a.ref_category_no = 1 WHERE q.no = #{no};
SELECT * FROM upload_file WHERE board_no = #{no} and ref_category_no = #{ref_category_no}

SELECT a.*, CASE WHEN u.file_count > 0 THEN file_count ELSE 0 END AS file_count FROM answers a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_no, COUNT(*) AS file_count FROM upload_file GROUP BY board_no ) u ON a.answer_no = u.board_no WHERE a.ref = #{no} and a.ref_category_no = 1;
SELECT * FROM upload_file WHERE board_no = #{answer_no} AND ref_category_no = #{board_category_no}
